summary: Replaces vanilla Nordic power with a new one
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6270-1-1326634430.jpg[/img]
[size=5][color=Mediumspringgreen]DESCRIPTION[/color][/size]
Currently in [color=Orangered]ALPHA ver. 0.1[/color]

I have been working on the Bow SFX for a while so I decided to take a break.. and came up with this simple (for fun) SFX for Race Powers.
This replaces vanilla Nord Power Battlecry SFX with a new one that might be [color=Orangered]Familiar[/color] to some of you.. or most. :D

[color=Green]For other races[/color]
If you wish to use this on other races (other than Nord), simply rename the Main File to your choice:

1. mag_powerracial_darkelfancestorswrath_fire_2d - For Dark Elves
2  mag_powerracial_redguardadrenalinerush_fire_2d - For Redguards
3. mag_powerracial_woodelfcommandanimal_fire_2d - For Wood Elves
4. mag_powerracial_pacify_fire_2d - For Imperials
5. mag_powerracial_berserker_fire_2d - For Orcs
6. mag_powerracial_dragonskin_fire_2d - For Bretons
7. mag_powerracial_histskin_01_2d - For Argonians

[color=Green]NOTE[/color]: I don\'t know the file name for High Elves and Haven\'t yet even tested that race (No racism intended) :)

[color=Mediumspringgreen]My Other mods[/color]
- [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4700]Alternative Shouts for Males[/url]
- [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4647]Shout the language of the Dragons [/url]


[color=Mediumspringgreen]INSTALL/UNINSTALL[/color]
Copy \"Sound\" Folder to Data folder and overwrite. To uninstall, simply delete file.
author: TheFPSmachine
